General.Name: Infund Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Infund Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the micro enameled wire, veterinary vaccine, and new energy businesses in China. The company offers enameled wire, copper-clad aluminum wire, tin-plated wire wire, and three-layer insulated wire used in electrical appliances, home appliances, electronic information, communications, and other industries. It also provides conventional vaccines for pigs and poultry, including wanchangjia, lilijia, yuanlijia, and blue ear. In addition, the company offers ternary lithium batteries, lithium iron phosphate batteries, and cathode materials for lithium-ion batteries. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Ronsen Super Micro-Wire Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Infund Holding Co., Ltd. in January 2017. Infund Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Rongchao Economic and Trade Center, Shenzhen, China, 518035
